ctx: intros A B x a e f H.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "(fix lookup (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) {struct x} : option A := match e with | nil => None | entry :: e0 => match x with | 0 => entry | S x0 => lookup A x0 e0 end end) A x e" in the current goal.

ctx: intros A B x a e f H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type x : nat a : A e : env A f : A -> B H : (fix lookup (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) {struct x} : option A := match e with | nil => None | entry :: e0 => match x with | 0 => entry | S x0 => lookup A x0 e0 end end) A x e = Some a Unable to unify "Some (f a)" with "(fix lookup (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) {struct x} : option A := match e with | nil => None | entry :: e0 => match x with | 0 => entry | S x0 => lookup A x0 e0 end end) B x (map f e)".

original: intros A B x a e f H. unfold lookup in *. simpl in H. rewrite H. reflexivity.
